item.sock.the_bottle.taunt: %1$s, you are now dehydrated for not drinking the water from The Bottle™. Prepare for consequences
item.sock.the_bottle.tooltip: The Bottle™ — Bottled for Survival. Bottled for the New Order.
subtitles.sock.drink_the_water: Wake Up And Drink The Water. Press sneak to place The Bottle™ itself down.
